name: Robots In Pieces
description:
Get ready, and try to keep your head as you fight through endless enemies in this arena survival game. 

Is the extremely far future, a new wave of slick robots have set out to dismantle all who are not of their make. In the scraps of a distant junkyard, the parts of dismantled robots begin to fuse back together to forge the Zombots! Now the new wave is after your Zombot, and it's time to dismantle them instead! How long can you survive?

Thanks to the Team!

@NeoAwesomeon - 3d Artist, textures, level design

@tlucero - Musician

@JCow - Musician

@Eazed - Sound Designer

@MisterJW - Developer

Controls:

LClick - basic punch attack

RClick - Lunge (Steal health and kill enemy if enemy is low enough)

1 - Uppercut (Fair warning: A bit hard to use)

2 - Spin Attack

3 - Golf Attack

4 - Flail Attack

R - Self Destruct (If health < 10)

Caution: This is an entry for Straight Up Game Jam, and is still in extremely early access. This is considered a prototype, and bugs and unfinished features are expected.
